name: Kinematic
details:
VCA based Compressor and an Envelope FilterKinematic is a Greek based word (Κίνημα), which describes motion – of points, bodies or systems of bodies, without the consideration of the forces that cause them to move.
Dreadbox KINEMATIC is a VCA based Compressor and an Envelope Filter effect pedal suitable for fretted instruments and synthesizers, with eurorack compatibility.
Full Analog VCA based Compressor
Band Boost Filter
Extreme Compration Ratio
Envelope Filter
Low Pass Filter
-Slow Envelope Curve
-Post Diode Overdrive Circuit
-Level Boost up to +18dB
-True Tone Maker
-3 patch points for our modular fans
https://www.dreadbox-fx.com/kinematic/
